column2: there's the matter of the sides.  They're all incredible.  I'd like it if the place had potato salad
column3: but I would be forced to take another couple minutes to decide on my sides each time if it did.  The owner
column6: stops to talk to customers constantly
column7: and when he stopped by our table mentioned that they're working on a potato salad.  With as much work as they've clearly put into the other sides
column8: I'm very much looking forward to it
column9: since I'll be going back regularly.
